column3: Midas Open: Station capability information for uk-daily-temperature-obs
This file documents the range of identifier types associated with a unique station in this version of the dataset
A station may be associated with different identifiers relating to different reporting roles
The MIDAS src_id is used as a consistent and unique identifier for a station throughout MIDAS-open datasets
Met Office MIDAS Open: UK Land Surface Stations Data
The identifier associated with a particular report type for this station
The identifier type associated with a particular reporting capability for this station
This identifies the group of reporting types (or capabilities) this identifier belongs to
For more information on message types see the MIDAS documentation
first year of data associated with this id/id_type in this version of this dataset
last year of data associated with this id/id_type in this version of this dataset
